entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:18 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
